price: Dios ha decretado: "Mis Mensajeros y Yo venceremos". Dios es Fortísimo, Poderoso.
arabic: كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَغۡلِبَنَّ أَنَا۠ وَرُسُلِيٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: kataba al-lahu la-aghlibanna anā warusulī inna al-laha qawiyyun ʿazīzun
